about_the_game:
Dive into the immersive world of The Farming Frontier, a unique wilderness RPG that blends serene farming simulation with captivating gameplay. Step into the shoes of a determined adventurer tasked with cultivating crops, cutting wood, catching fish, mining, and establishing a flourishing village in the midst of untamed land.



In this charming simulation adventure, you'll step into the worn boots of a skilled farmer, eager to carve out a homestead from the untamed lands. Cultivate the fertile soil, plant a diverse range of crops, and carefully tend to your harvests as you learn the art of sustainable agriculture.



Sharpen the skills of your villagers through rigorous training, ensuring they are adept in various tasks. Nourish them with sustenance and witness their collaboration in diverse activities that enhance your village's economy.



Establish an assortment of specialized residences including a woodcutter's lodge, a forester's cabin, a stonepit dwelling, a fishery station, a bakery hub, a windmill abode, a blacksmith forge, and even a barracks outpost.

🌾 Cultivate Your Dreams: Take charge of your destiny as you nurture crops, transforming the wilderness into a thriving oasis of greenery.

🪓 Master of All Trades: From chopping wood to catching fish, mining precious resources to baking bread, your skills will shape the future of your village.

🏞️ Explore the Untamed: Navigate through untouched landscapes teeming with hidden wonders and challenges. Unveil the secrets that lie within the wild.

🏰 Reclaim and Triumph: As you build your village, face off against adversarial forces that threaten your progress. Reclaim what's rightfully yours and emerge victorious.

🛠️ Craft Your Legacy: Your pixelated farming adventure isn't just about survival—it's about leaving an indelible mark on the land and its people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU, 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU, 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: The Farming Frontier is a tranquil wilderness RPG, that delivers a farming simulation. Within this realm, you can cultivate crops, cut wood, catch fish, mine, and build amid wild landscapes. Reclaim your village, and confront adversaries in this tranquil wilderness RPG.
